alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Park County; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 10:50AM MST until February 16 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, the Indian Peaks, and South Park. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to Midnight MST Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Chain and traction laws will possibly be enacted for the mountains. If traveling to the mountains, be prepared for winter driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Park County; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
